Genome coordinates available in the package.

Source: R/get_gene_annotations.R
get_gene_annotations.Rd

From a CONGAS object, it teturns the tibbles for the genomic coordinates available in the package that have been used to assemble the object.

get_gene_annotations(x)

Arguments

x

An input CONGAS object.

Value

The required tibble.

Examples


x = Rcongas::congas_example

get_gene_annotations(x)
#> # A tibble: 57,773 × 4
#>    chr     from     to gene        
#>    <chr>  <int>  <int> <chr>       
#>  1 chr1   11869  14412 DDX11L1     
#>  2 chr1   14363  29806 WASH7P      
#>  3 chr1   29554  31109 MIR1302-10  
#>  4 chr1   34554  36081 FAM138A     
#>  5 chr1   52473  54936 OR4G4P      
#>  6 chr1   62948  63887 OR4G11P     
#>  7 chr1   69091  70008 OR4F5       
#>  8 chr1   89295 133566 RP11-34P13.7
#>  9 chr1   89551  91105 RP11-34P13.8
#> 10 chr1  131025 134836 CICP27      
#> # … with 57,763 more rows
